content.text: The connecting hardware used for balanced cabling shall be installed to provide minimal signal impairment  by preserving wire pair twists and conductor separation as closely as possible to the point of mechanical  termination (by not changing the original twist). In addition only a minimum of the cable sheath shall be  removed in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions.
